other_title: きゃんきゃんバニーエクストラ (Japanese)
plot: Looking at him, he ain't much. But Kenta scores with every girl he meets. Why, well, he has a love-struck goddess who's decided to help him out. After the celestial sweetie takes a shine to him, she grants him the ability to seduce seven different women to find out which one is his true love, and in the end, it is a big suprise who his actual true love is.
ending_theme: "Still the Moment" by Kappei Yamaguchi, Kumiko Nishihara, Pikabia
